Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Cicero
ShortDescription: #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Central, Augusta, Austin and Chicago, due to a Marathon near Chicago/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Central, Augusta, Austin and Chicago, then resume their normal route: due to a Marathon near Chicago/Cicero. 

Allow extra travel time.

Revised

Headline: Howard bound Yellow Line Service Delayed at Oakton
ShortDescription: Howard bound Yellow Line trains are standing at Oakton due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard bound Yellow Line trains are standing at Oakton due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
